title: Panasonic 100 cm (40 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV  (TH-40HS450DX)

product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPG, MPEG, MP4, MKV, AVI, FLV, DVD Video, WAV, WMA
product_specification.Processor: ARM CA53 Quad Core with TEE and Secure Boot
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Image Format Supported - JPEG, GIF, PNG, TIFF, RAW, Matte Screen Finish
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product from Date of Purchase
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Any Technical or Manufacturing Defects are Covered in Warranty
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Physical Damages After Usage and Scratches on Panel are Not Covered in Warranty
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Android OS: This TV features the Android OS which brings you tons of features and preinstalled apps, such as YouTube, Netflix, and more so that you can watch as many movies and shows as you want.
product_description.Inbuilt Google Assistance: This TV is equipped with inbuilt Google assistance so that you can control the TV without using your hands. You can use voice commands to control the various features of the TV.

review: Great product in the budget. Great picture quality with sound and connectivity. Do not go for a China product rather buy Panasonic. It's a very old brand from Japan and I like this brand. That bazel display is superb adding beauty to the android tv. Overall go for it.. Worth product..

It was a blind guess for me. Was buying for my parents, taking my chances. They really liked it.
* The bezels are very small for 20k tv, edge to edge, no protruding bezels.
* 16W speaker, but the sound clarity is very good than expected
* Haven't installed any apps other than Netflix, Prime. Because those are what my parents subscribed. Have no lag issues.
* Very good viewing angles. Almost 180 degrees horizontally, vertically you'll be fine.
* Comes with wall mount within box
* Comes with Android 9, so, long app support time speaking technically
* Classic non-compact remote. Will go easy for all ages.
* Delivered on time, no issues with the piece till now, installation before given time. Good from Flipkart.

Cons:
* Internal storage available for user is clipped to 4gb. Deal with it yourselves.
* Price could've been a K less seeing it's jumping into 4K tv arena a bit with 20K tag.
* For very large halls or home with many children, 16W speakers may sound slight a bit low. This may be knit-picking but yeah, that's it for now.
To avoid Chinese Brands, I have moved to Panasonic. . Superb product with good quality. . Worth for money. .

Awesome product. IPS, display clarity perfect
Sound Dolby it resemble the promise all into
a sensible product love this.
Thanks Flipkart & Panasonic ⭐⭐⭐⭐*

A brand is always a brand... usually tv's process good (hd/uhd)quality video's content more better/clearer but this one does an Excellent picture processing even with low (SD setup box)quality content which does only by old players like sony,lg,samsung, panasonic etc.

Coming to sound, it is at next level when you enable "Dolby audio processing" option(attached image) in settings sound menu. A "Refined audio codec" is excellent and clearer audio which is miles away compared to new brand TV's.

Coming to connectivity, wifi connects smoothly and automatically as soon as I enable "wifi hotspot" in my mobile which is really cool thing. Connection stability is good for longer time without disconnection. Also patchwall experience is quick and fast.

Through bluetooth we can connect to headset/soundbars(A2DP sink) and listen a song through headset, also we can connect to mobile(A2DP source) and listen songs through TV audio speakers which is cool.

My con's:
--This updated new smart remote has Google assistant feature which by default is not working.
--flipkart delivered one day late by promised delivery date. Also 4-5days gone, still no installation guy visited.
I would love to tell that this Panasonic tv is amazing , crystal clear visibility and worth to buy. Not regretting at all.
I had Iffalcon tv but this panasonic tv is more stylish and lag free then Iffalcon. We also getting the best support from a trusted brand. Go for japanese.

Review after 1 year of use: Panasonic never had the budget range TV, this was the first time they touched this price range. Had blindly ordered this TV and shockingly the TV is excellent.
Frankly, I wanted to avoid China product so removed the second choice from the cart. This product is manufactured and assembled in India by a Japanese company Panasonic.
Picture quality and sound quality is nice. They provide wall mount kit with the TV so it saves your money. The wall mount is smartly designed to cut the cost. Only problem is there is hardly any space to plug in anything, but is can be resolved by taking out whole TV which is quite easy.
Another problem is - it does not come with 3.5mm audio jack but not an issue a the sound quality is good.
Overall it the best choice if you want a 40" TV within the budget of 22000.

Point :- display, sound, connectivity, build, remote and setoff box, play back.

1) displays - super bright display, super cut clear picture quality ( online and usb offline videos) there is no need for 4k display for web content playback. 100% positive you will love display quality.
2) sounds - there is no magic (like ss or Dolby sound) sound factor in this tv. It's basic also satisfying Bass is thare. Sound is too loud my hall room needs just 5% volume.
3) connectivity -
remote connectivity not once issue detected.
WiFi connectivity routers needs to be in range 20 feet with not wall or others things in between both.
Wire connectivity no problem detected.
4) build - it's Panasonic not chaina quality so be positive
side frame very small gives premium look and feels good on wall mount. Remember one thing it's 40" Tv so 6 to 10 feet distance needed. No more than that in my case 15 feet looks bit smaller to me.
5) remote and setoff box - remote looks above average quality, easy to understand, slim and very few useful keys.

Set off box, mine is SD+HD dish tv so HD channel no problem but in SD channel (few channel 5 to 10 channels ) is not looking good because it's wide panel. So 3 or 4 movie and 4 or 5 regional channel.
6) Play back - smooth on dish channel. smooth for web 1080p 30fps and 60 fps.

No 4k side play or other way.

Hope u understand.

Good product

1. Got it in big billion sales in 15099. Can't even imagine a panasonic within this price.
2. First thing you will notice is the quality in picture. I have mi 40 inch as well and the panasonic shows why it is a panasonic. While mi at close distance with a SD connection pixelated panasonic holds it intact. SD connection too looks awesome in this tv.
3. There is a composite jack on this tv and a rca (red, yellow, white) female to male comes with the package, so if your set top box is an old one that works with rca output, don't worry you can connect it with that cable and composite jack.
4. You have an external sound system or home theatre then you can connect it with optical or hdmi cable. There is no 3.5 output in this tv.
5. Netflix, prime and YouTube works flawlessly on this tv unlike my mi 40 inch which runs on patchwall and nothing works on that unless you do 'zugaad' downloading some other apps.
6. Havent checked screen mirroring yet but connecting to wifi is super easy.
7. I tried playing avi video format with usb, it didn't work and had to download VLC player, with VLC I'm playing almost all the formats.
